intro.start: const Ceiara = ( name, passion ) => { console.log(`${name} has a passion for ${passion}`); }

header.name: Ceiara Madrigal.

paragraph: Cal Poly Pomona Computer Science graduate and an aspiring software developer with diverse language and framework experience--driven by a lifelong learning passion and a desire to make a lasting impact
